author: Christopher Wright
comment: Load of rubbish I installed the app on my phone unable to pick name or team a complete con and a waste of money. If possible I would have given it 0 stars :(    I'm using a Sony Smartwatch 3 :)

reply.author: Green Gloves Inc.
reply.content: Hey Christopher, sorry to hear you're having issues. I use a Sony Smartwatch 3 as my test device so I'll have a look into this and see if I can find any issues. If you email me at greenglovesdev@gmail.com we can get this sorted :)

author: David Taroyan
comment: Looks really good and developer is very quick with response and gets requests completed quickly.  Great job!

reply.author: Green Gloves Inc.
reply.content: Thanks David! If you'd like any other teams then please let me know :)

title: Great Watch Face
